@graph.name: Blockclust 1.1.0 Clustering
@graph.description:
Small Non-coding RNA Clustering using BlockClust

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Small Non-coding RNA Clustering using BlockClust](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/transcriptomics/tutorials/small_ncrna_clustering/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
